name: AMPS (Auxiliary Mathematics Problems and Solutions)
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A comprehensive dataset of over 100,000 Khan Academy problems and approximately 5 million Mathematica-generated problems, each with step-by-step solutions.
notes: Developed to support mathematical problem-solving model training, AMPS includes problems from Khan Academy covering topics from basic addition to multivariable calculus, and Mathematica-generated problems based on 100 hand-designed modules across various mathematical subjects.
